question: Why is Kota Bogor, Indonesia known as the "City of Rain"?
true_answer: Because it has a very high rainfall.
asked_question_translated: Miért nevezik az indonéziai Kota Bogort az "eső városának"?
answer: Kota Bogort az "eső városának" nevezik, mert gyakran esik az eső, még az indonéz száraz évszakban is.
answer_translated_eng: Kota Bogor is known as the "city of rain" because it rains often, even in the Indonesian dry season.
